original_text: And the Rabshakeh said to them, “Say to Hezekiah, ‘Thus says the great king, the king of Assyria: On what do you rest this trust of yours?
korean_text: 랍사게가 그들에게 이르되 이제 히스기야에게 말하라 대왕 앗수르 왕이 이같이 말씀하시기를 네가 믿는 바 그 믿는 것이 무엇이냐

sentences.original_text: And the Rabshakeh said to them,
Thus says the great king, the king of Assyria:
On what do you rest this trust of yours?
